What are the treatments for cleidocranial dysplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of cleidocranial dysplasia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Cleidocranial Dysplasia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cleidocranial dysostosis  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Cleidocranial dysostosis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genet
